T02TD3551E:186b-1: a'arya badzra sva ra sva t'i s'a dha nam /
T02TD3551E:186b-3: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3551E:186b-4: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3551E:186b-5: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs gsal sbyin yon tan rang bzhin rdo rje dbyangs can mar btung nas //
T02TD3551E:186b-6: rang la phan pa yang dag sgrub mdzad mdzes pa'i nyams lnga rtsod pas thub par dka' mdzad ma //
T02TD3551E:186b-7: de yi sgrub thabs 'di ni kun nas yang dag mi bzad mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD3551E:187a-1: rtogs phyir sems can phan phyir legs par gsungs pa'i cho gas bshad par bya //
T02TD3551E:187a-2: dang por snga bar kha la sogs pa dag pa'i rang bzhin snying rje dang ldan bzod ldan pas //
T02TD3551E:187a-3: sngags pas gtsang ba'i stan la byams pa'i dga' bas myos shing gang zhig dga' ba dang ldan pas //
T02TD3551E:187a-4: gnas kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben bar yang ni rang gi snying gar chu skyes blta bar bya //
T02TD3551E:187a-5: de las sprul pa las byung ri bong 'dzin pa yang dag bsgom par bya'o de la yang //
T02TD3551E:187a-6: do:yig 'od zer rnams kyis phyogs dang bar rnams kyang ni 'di yis yongs su gang bar gyur //
T02TD3551E:187a-7: de nas sangs rgyas tshogs rnams mdun du bltas nas 'dir ni mchod phal sogs bsgom par bya //
T02TD3551E:187a-8: me tog la sogs de nas phyag 'tshal slar yang 'dir ni sdigs pa rab tu bshags pa bya //
T02TD3551E:187a-9: de bzhin bsod nams rjes su yi rang sngags rig pa yis gsum la skyabs su yang dag 'gro //
T02TD3551E:187a-10: zhes pa la sogs smon lam legs btab de yis bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs pa rab tu bya //
T02TD3551E:187a-11: gcig dang du ma dang bral rang bzhin yongs su brjod pa dri med yang dag shes rtogs pa //
T02TD3551E:187a-12: de nas sna tshogs rnam rtog dra ba ma lus thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3551E:187a-13: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD3551E:187a-14: stong pa nyid las byung ba chu skyes dang ni zla ba la gnas do:yig dmar po ste /
T02TD3551E:187a-15: slar yang sna tshogs 'od zer tshogs rnams shin tu mdzes par gyur pa'i padma 'dab brgya da pa //
T02TD3551E:187a-16: de la dmar zhing 'od zer chen po dang ldan bcom ldan 'das ma mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD3551E:187a-17: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis yang dag gnas shing zhal gsum phyag drug gis ni rab brgyan pa //
T02TD3551E:187a-18: g-yas pa'i zhal ni sngo zhing phyag na padma ral gri gri gug rab tu bsnams pa ste //
T02TD3551E:187a-19: g-yon zhal dkar zhing phyag na lhung bzed dang bcas rin chen bzang dang 'khor lo de bzhin no //
T02TD3551E:187a-20: snying gar padma la gnas zla ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i der yang do:yig 'od gsal bas //
T02TD3551E:187a-21: sna tshogs mi shes mun ba 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyis ni 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs mdzad pa //
T02TD3551E:187a-22: yang dag bsdus la rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas sa bon bltas la slar yang spro//
T02TD3551E:187b-0: @187b de nyid yang dang yang du rtag tu snyom las med par nyi ma so sor bsam par bya //
T02TD3551E:187b-1: bsam gtan ngal na sa bon mnyam skyes bsdus la sngags 'di yis ni bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02TD3551E:187b-2: do shal g-yo zhing nyin byed rim pas 'byung ba'i yid bzhin du ni sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3551E:187b-3: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradznya wardha ni /
T02TD3551E:187b-6: dhi ri dhi ri budhi wardha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD3551E:187b-7: thun mtshams thams cad du ni lha mo'i sku la yid ni rtag tu rab tu dga' ba yis //
T02TD3551E:187b-8: yang dag gsungs pa'i cho gas sems can rnams gyi don gyur sngags 'di yongs su bzlas par bya //
T02TD3551E:187b-9: bsod nams kyang ni yongs su bsngo bya dgos pa byed na bsam gtan rtse gcig gnas par spyod //
T02TD3551E:187b-10: ji srid 'bum phrag yongs su ma rdzogs pa'am rdzogs nas kyang ni las kyi rim bzhin bya //
T02TD3551E:187b-11: rnam pa thams cad du ni mi mthun phyogs su nye bar yang yang de nyid bsam gtan byed //
T02TD3551E:187b-12: dkar po'i tshes gcig nas ni shin tu dge ba'i yid kyis ji srid zla ba gnas kyi bar //
T02TD3551E:187b-13: de srid legs spyar de bzhin nub re bzhin du ji srid zla ba gang ba bzhin du bya //
T02TD3551E:187b-14: de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3551E:187b-15: gang zhig dpal ldan gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud la gnas shing dpal ldan nag po'i gzi brjid kyis //
T02TD3551E:187b-16: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can bcom ldan 'das ma de yi yang dag sgrub pa'i thabs gyur pa //
T02TD3551E:187b-17: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du bdag gis brtsams pa'i bsod nams yang dag thob gyur pa //
T02TD3551E:187b-18: de yis 'gro rnams nag po lta bur thub par dka' ba'i snyan ngag mkhan du grub par shog / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dpal 'dzin gyis //
T02TD3551E:187b-19: dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can gyi //
T02TD3551E:187b-20: 'joms byed mthar ni byed pa yi //
T02TD3551E:187b-21: sgrub pa'i thabs ni legs byas so //
T02TD3551E:187b-22: 'phags ma rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
